post.text: Here I am with Mary Ann Mendoza, in Arizona. Her son Brandon - a hero -- died as a result of the same policies that Crooked Hillary Clinton supports. Keep the Mendoza family in your thoughts and prayers - along with all of the other families who have lost loved ones.

comment.author: Haley
comment.text: GOOGLE CLINTON SCANDALS!!! THERE IS A LONG LIST OF THEM!!! TRUMP2016!

replies.author: Caellagh
replies.text: Google Donald Trump scandals I'm sure you will find hundreds...
